RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: ReSynth
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Fourth generation native Renoise synthesiser.
Features include:
- Four oscillators - Selectable oscillator types: - Virtual analog - FM Synthesis (3 operator) - User waveform - SuperSaw (oscillator 1 only) - Independant oscillator settings for: - Transpose - Tuning - Volume - Panning - AHDBDSR volume envelope - Volume LFO (tremelo) - Filter type selector - AHBDBSR filter cutoff envelope - Filter cutoff LFO - Filter resonance LFO - Filter resonance control - Velocity to filter cutoff control - Programming arpeggiator: - Up to 16 steps in length - Variable sequence length - Variable sequence step length - Independant pitch per step - Independant controls to apply to volume, pitch and filter
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Martin Bealby | mxb (mbealby@gmail.com)
